00032 typedef struct {
00033   SlaterDet* Qa;                
00034   SlaterDet* Qb;                
00035   double d;                     
00036   int Ma;                       
00037   int *Jb;                      
00038   int *Mb;                      
00039   int *Kb;                      
00040   int *Pib;                     
00041   int izcw;                     
00042   int nangles;

00046 MultiSlaterDet DiClusterProjSlaterDet = {
00047   A : 0,
00048   N : 0,
00049   n : 0,
00050   symmetry : DiClusterProjSlaterDetSymmetry,
00051   weight : DiClusterProjSlaterDetWeight,
00052   get : DiClusterProjSlaterDetGet,
00053   internals : NULL
00054 };

00056 
00057 // axial symmetry given by sum of K projections
00058 Symmetry DiClusterProjSlaterDetSymmetry(const MultiSlaterDet* MSD, int iM)
00059 {
00060   DiClusterProjSlaterDetInternals* internals = MSD->internals;
00061 
00062   Symmetry S=0;
00063   setSymmetry(&S, axial0 + internals->Ma + internals->Mb[iM]);
00064   
00065   return S;
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 complex double DiClusterProjSlaterDetWeight(const MultiSlaterDet* MSD, int iM, int i)
00070 {
00071   DiClusterProjSlaterDetInternals* internals = MSD->internals;
00072 
00073   int izcw = internals->izcw;
00074   int nangles = internals->nangles;
00075   int J, M, K;
00076   J = internals->Jb[iM];
00077   M = internals->Mb[iM];
00078   K = internals->Kb[iM];
00079 
00080   double alpha,beta,gamma;
00081   getangles3(izcw, i, &alpha, &beta, &gamma);
00082 
00083   return 1.0/nangles* (J+1)* Djmkstar(J,M,K,alpha,beta,gamma);
00084 }

00086 // workspace
00087 static SlaterDet *tmpQa, *tmpQb;
00088 
00089 void joinintoSlaterDets(const SlaterDet* Qa, const SlaterDet* Qb, SlaterDet* Q)
00090 {
00091   assert(Q->A == Qa->A+Qb->A);
00092 
00093   Q->Z = Qa->Z+Qb->Z;
00094   Q->N = Qa->N+Qb->N;
00095   Q->ngauss = Qa->ngauss+Qb->ngauss;
00096 
00097   int i;
00098   // copy Qa
00099   for (i=0; i<Qa->A; i++) {
00100     Q->idx[i] = Qa->idx[i];
00101     Q->ng[i] = Qa->ng[i];
00102   }
00103   for (i=0; i<Qa->ngauss; i++)
00104     Q->G[i] = Qa->G[i];
00105 
00106   // copy Qb
00107   for (i=0; i<Qb->A; i++) {
00108     Q->idx[i+Qa->A] = Qb->idx[i]+Qa->ngauss;
00109     Q->ng[i+Qa->A] = Qb->ng[i];
00110   }
00111   for (i=0; i<Qb->ngauss; i++) 
00112     Q->G[i+Qa->ngauss] = Qb->G[i];
00113 }
00114 
00115 // Parity not considered yet
00116 void DiClusterProjSlaterDetGet(const MultiSlaterDet* MSD, int i, SlaterDet* Q)
00117 {
00118   // initialize workspace
00119   if (!tmpQa) {
00120     tmpQa = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00121     tmpQb = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00122     allocateSlaterDet(tmpQa, MSD->A);
00123     allocateSlaterDet(tmpQb, MSD->A);
00124   }
00125 
00126   DiClusterProjSlaterDetInternals* internals = MSD->internals;
00127 
00128   int izcw = internals->izcw;
00129   double alpha,beta,gamma;
00130   getangles3(izcw, i, &alpha, &beta, &gamma);
00131   
00132   copySlaterDet(internals->Qa, tmpQa);
00133   copySlaterDet(internals->Qb, tmpQb);
00134 
00135   double massa = tmpQa->Z*mproton + tmpQa->N*mneutron;
00136   double massb = tmpQb->Z*mproton + tmpQb->N*mneutron;
00137   double mass = massa + massb;
00138 
00139   double xa[3] = {0,0,0};
00140   double xb[3] = {0,0,0};
00141 
00142   xa[2] = massb/mass* internals->d;
00143   xb[2] = -massa/mass* internals->d;
00144 
00145   moveSlaterDet(tmpQa, xa);
00146 
00147   rotateSlaterDet(tmpQb, alpha, beta, gamma);
00148   moveSlaterDet(tmpQb, xb);
00149 
00150   joinintoSlaterDets(tmpQa, tmpQb, Q);
00151 }

00154 #define BUFSIZE 255
00155 int DiClusterProjSlaterDetRead(FILE* fp, MultiSlaterDet* MSD)
00156 {
00157   *MSD = DiClusterProjSlaterDet;
00158 
00159   double d;
00160   int izcw;
00161   int N;
00162   SlaterDet Qa, Qb;
00163   char fnamea[255], fnameb[255];
00164   char md5hasha[255], md5hashb[255];
00165   int Ma;
00166 
00167   char buf[BUFSIZE];
00168 
00169   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00170   sscanf(buf, "<DiClusterProjSlaterDet d=%lf izcw=%d N=%d>", &d, &izcw, &N);
00171   
00172   int nangles=nangles3(izcw);
00173 
00174   int Jb[N];
00175   int Mb[N];
00176   int Kb[N];
00177   int Pib[N];
00178 
00179   int i;
00180   for (i=0; i<N; i++) {
00181     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00182     sscanf(buf, "<Projection %d %d %d %d>", &Jb[i], &Mb[i], &Kb[i], &Pib[i]);
00183   }
00184 
00185   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00186   sscanf(buf, "<Cluster %s %s %d>", fnamea, md5hasha, &Ma); 
00187   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00188   sscanf(buf, "<Cluster %s %s>", fnameb, md5hashb); 
00189 
00190   if (strncmp(md5hasha, md5hash(fnamea), 32)) {
00191     fprintf(stderr, "...  SlaterDetFile does not match with existing hash\n");
00192     return -1;
00193   }
00194   if (strncmp(md5hashb, md5hash(fnameb), 32)) {
00195     fprintf(stderr, "...  SlaterDetFile does not match with existing hash\n");
00196     return -1;
00197   }
00198 
00199   if (readSlaterDetfromFile(&Qa, fnamea)) {
00200     fprintf(stderr, "... couldn't open %s for reading\n", fnamea);
00201     return -1;
00202   }
00203   if (readSlaterDetfromFile(&Qb, fnameb)) {
00204     fprintf(stderr, "... couldn't open %s for reading\n", fnameb);
00205     return -1;
00206   }
00207 
00208   DiClusterProjSlaterDetInternals* internals = 
00209     malloc(sizeof(DiClusterProjSlaterDetInternals));
00210 
00211   internals->Qa = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00212   cloneSlaterDet(&Qa, internals->Qa);
00213 
00214   internals->Qb = malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00215   cloneSlaterDet(&Qb, internals->Qb);
00216 
00217   internals->d = d;
00218   internals->Ma = Ma;
00219 
00220   internals->Jb = malloc(N*sizeof(int));
00221   internals->Mb = malloc(N*sizeof(int));
00222   internals->Kb = malloc(N*sizeof(int));
00223   internals->Pib = malloc(N*sizeof(int));
00224 
00225   for (i=0; i<N; i++) {
00226     internals->Jb[i] = Jb[i];
00227     internals->Mb[i] = Mb[i];
00228     internals->Kb[i] = Kb[i];
00229     internals->Pib[i] = Pib[i];
00230   }
00231 
00232   internals->izcw = izcw;
00233   internals->nangles = nangles;
00234 
00235   MSD->A = Qa.A + Qb.A;
00236   MSD->N = N;
00237   MSD->n = nangles;
00238   MSD->internals = internals;
00239 
00240   return 0;
00241 }
